translation.fr: Pourquoi construire une telle maison au pays de Galles ?

translation.en: [Jack] Can you behave, please?
No comments like that when we get out of this car.
translation.fr: Pas de commentaires du genre hors de la voiture.

translation.en: Mr. Whitehall?
-That's me. Hello, how are you? -How are you? How was your journey?
translation.fr: - C'est moi. Bonjour. - Comment a été votre voyage ?

translation.en: -Very well. Very good. -Welcome to Palé Hall.
translation.fr: - Très bien. - Bienvenue au Palé Hall.

translation.en: -Hey, how are you, mate? -Very good.
Have you got a beautiful young lady in here waiting for me?
translation.fr: Y a-t-il une belle jeune femme qui m'attend ?

translation.en: -I'm sure we do. -[Jack] Beautiful young lady?
translation.fr: - Je crois que oui. - Une belle jeune femme ?

translation.en: Please don't talk about my mother like that.
translation.fr: Ne parle pas de ma mère comme ça.

translation.en: -Beautiful, young… Well-built, buxom… -[Jack] Stop!
translation.fr: - Belle, jeune. Bien bâtie, plantureuse… - Arrête !

translation.en: -[Jack, sing-song] Hello! -[Hilary] Hello, hello, hello!
-Hello. -Lovely to see you, Momsies.
translation.fr: Je suis contente de te voir.

translation.en: -Would you like to kiss Winston? -No, I wouldn't.
translation.fr: - Tu veux embrasser Winston ? - Non, merci.

translation.en: -Hello, Winston. -Say hello, Winston.
Hello, bubs.
-You look lovely. -Thank you.
Happy anniversary!
-Yes! -[Hilary] How's it been?
-Thirty-five years. -Long.
-Not as long as 35 years. -Not as long as 35 years. Indeed.
translation.fr: - Pas aussi long que 35 ans. - Tout à fait.

translation.en: -[Hilary] So… -[Michael] Lovely.
The reason I've booked this beautiful five-star hotel
translation.fr: J'ai réservé dans ce bel hôtel cinq étoiles

translation.en: is because you're going to be here tonight having dinner, etc.
translation.fr: pour que tu puisses y dîner.

translation.en: -Our wedding anniversary. -It is our wedding anniversary.
translation.fr: - C'est notre anniversaire de mariage. - Oui.

translation.en: But I'm afraid there's a little bit of a twist this year,
translation.fr: Mais il y a un rebondissement cette année.

translation.en: as there's an exciting camping experience I'd like Jack and I to do.
translation.fr: Jack et moi irons faire une expérience de camping passionnante.

translation.en: And as I always took you kids camping,
I thought we could recreate a bit of that together on our last trip.
translation.fr: Nous pourrions recréer cela ensemble lors de notre dernier voyage.

translation.en: We're camping and he'll stay in the 5-star hotel?
translation.fr: Nous camperons et il restera dans cet hôtel ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think that's a pretty good setup.
Happy about that?
No.
Cockblock.
The only thing is you're not going to be alone, though,
translation.fr: Mais tu ne seras pas seul.

translation.en: because…
I don't think Winston should come camping.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas que Winston devrait aller camper.

translation.en: The other thing I should just point out,
translation.fr: Il y a autre chose que je souhaite ajouter.

translation.en: I know you weren't allowed to get into Winston Churchill's bed/bath at Chartwell.
translation.fr: je sais que tu n'as pas pu entrer dans le lit / la baignoire de Churchill.

translation.en: The big news is that Winston Churchill stayed here.
translation.fr: La bonne nouvelle est que Churchill a dormi ici.

translation.en: There is a Winston Churchill suite.
translation.fr: Il y a une suite Churchill.

translation.en: Really?
So, we're going round the country,
translation.fr: Nous voyageons à travers le pays

translation.en: so that I can get into baths and beds
translation.fr: afin que je puisse entrer dans les lits et baignoires

translation.en: that have previously been occupied by Winston Churchill.
-Is that it? -That's the thought.
Fine, okay. Well, I'm going to celebrate my wedding anniversary on my own…
translation.fr: Très bien. Je vais célébrer mon anniversaire de mariage tout seul…

translation.en: -No! -…with a doll…
-That sounds worse. -…in Winston Churchill's bed.
translation.fr: - C'est pire. - …dans le lit de Churchill.

translation.en: Don't tell anyone in the hotel
translation.fr: Ne dis à personne dans l'hôtel

translation.en: that you'll be celebrating your wedding anniversary
translation.fr: que tu vas célébrer ton anniversaire de mariage

translation.en: in bed with a doll.
-They might get the wrong idea… -No, I won't.
…or possibly the right one.
We head to the island of Anglesey,
translation.fr: Nous nous dirigeons vers l'île d'Anglesey,

translation.en: where Mommy reveals to me that we're not just going camping,
translation.fr: où maman me révèle que nous n'allons pas juste camper.

translation.en: but cliff camping,
where you sleep off the side of a cliff.
translation.fr: et dormirons le long de la façade.

translation.en: -Nah, not for me, this one. -[dramatic music playing]
Mommy and I will be spending the night high above the water and the rocks,
translation.fr: Maman et moi passerons la nuit au-dessus de l'eau et des rochers,

translation.en: directly against the cliff face,
on that, a rickety stretcher dangling from a piece of string.
translation.fr: là-dessus, un civière branlante qui pend au bout d'une ficelle.

translation.en: So, I think it's just up here.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est juste là.

translation.en: -Hello! -Hello!
-Hey. -I'm Sam.
-Hey, Sam. -I'm Hilary.
-Do you know what we're doing? -It looks quite terrifying.
translation.fr: - Vous savez ce qu'on fait ? - Ça a l'air terrifiant.

translation.en: With the evening fast approaching,
it's time to get on our equipment and literally throw ourselves off a cliff.
translation.fr: il est temps de nous équiper et de nous jeter d'une falaise.

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. It really is a cliff.
-Why don't you just bring that up here? -[Sam laughs]
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous ne le remontez pas ?

translation.en: I've got down to this bit and I'll lower my ass,
translation.fr: Je descends jusque-là et baisse mon cul,

translation.en: and you just place it on my ass.
translation.fr: et vous le placez juste dessous.

translation.en: Then we're good to go.
-[Sam] That's it, Jack. -[grunts]
Oh, fuck.
Oh, what's that creaking?
Shut up, Hilary.
There's no creaking, Mother.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de craquements.

translation.en: With me safely in position,
translation.fr: Une fois que je suis en position sûre,

translation.en: it was Hilary's turn to gracefully descend.
translation.fr: c'est au tour d'Hilary de descendre avec grâce.

translation.en: -I've got to get over here, haven't I? -[Sam] Yeah, that's it.
translation.fr: - Je dois passer par là ? - Oui, c'est ça.

translation.en: My mother, in a tightly-packed harness, being winched on top of me.
translation.fr: Ma mère, dans un harnais serré, est treuillée sur moi.

translation.en: Just cut my rope now!
Oh my God. I definitely should have gone second.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu. J'aurais dû descendre après toi.

translation.en: Jack!
Please don't make me laugh. I go all weak when I…
translation.fr: Ne me fais pas rire. Je me ramollis quand je…

translation.en: I can't look down and I can't look up.
translation.fr: Je ne peux regarder ni en haut ni en bas.

translation.en: -[Sam] Hilary, keep yourself on-- -[Hilary] This side?
-[Sam] Yeah. -Step over this one.
-Yeah, alright. -No, you're behind it, Mommy.
-I know I am. -You're too low.
translation.fr: - Je le sais. - Tu es trop bas.

translation.en: -Get over there. -Don't make me laugh.
translation.fr: - Va là. - Ne me fais pas rire.

translation.en: Put your weight on there, Hilary.
-I'm sorry. -Lower.
Lower.
-Okay? -I've got hysterical, sorry.
translation.fr: - Ça va ? - Je suis morte de rire.

translation.en: -[Sam] Why don't you turn around? -[Hilary] Oh, yes, I will.
Maybe one at a time. Slow, steady movements.
translation.fr: L'un après l'autre. Des mouvements lents.

translation.en: Right, I'm definitely going first this time…
translation.fr: Cette fois-ci je vais en premier.

translation.en: Went first… Why are you going first?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu y vas en premier ?

translation.en: I'm just getting it over and done with.
Ooh, fucking hell. Please don't do that.
translation.fr: Putain de merde. Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: -[yells] Oh, fuck. -Jack, what are you doing? I'm trying to get round.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? - Je me retourne.

translation.en: How's it going there, Jack?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Good?
-I mean, the view is spectacular. -I'm really not that into this.
translation.fr: - La vue est splendide. - C'est pas vraiment mon truc.

translation.en: I'm loving this, Jack.
Where's your spirit of adventure?
I left it at the top of the cliff.
You're sounding, can I just say,
translation.fr: On croirait entendre, si je puis dire,

translation.en: like the son of your father.
-[waiter] Mr. Whitehall, how are we? -Very well, thank you.
translation.fr: - M. Whitehall, comment allez-vous ? - Très bien, merci.

translation.en: -Can I pour your tea for you? -Thank you.
-And would he like some? -Definitely.
translation.fr: - En veut-il aussi ? - Tout à fait.

translation.en: You'd like tea, wouldn't you, Winston,
translation.fr: Tu veux du thé, n'est-ce pas, Winston,

translation.en: with Daddy?
[Hilary] So, the final adventure.
[Jack] It might be if we never make it off this platform.
translation.fr: Ça pourrait l'être si on ne s'en sort pas d'ici.

translation.en: I don't mean this moment. I mean the whole journey with your dad.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas de maintenant, mais du voyage avec ton père.

translation.en: How's it been?
-Yeah, it's been lovely. -Yeah?
It's been very nice to be back on the road with him.
translation.fr: C'est bien d'être sur la route avec lui.

translation.en: I didn't think we'd be back on the road again,
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas qu'on pourrait le refaire,

translation.en: but I'm very thankful
that we are back,
traveling together.
Obviously, it's been a very, very weird year.
translation.fr: Évidemment, cette année a été très étrange.

translation.en: -It was also scary. -It was scary.
translation.fr: - Ça a été aussi effrayant. - C'est vrai.

translation.en: Scary not seeing you and also just not knowing…
translation.fr: De ne pas vous voir et de ne pas savoir…

translation.en: Yeah.
With Molly being pregnant as well and all of that going on at the same time…
translation.fr: Avec Molly qui était enceinte en même temps et tout le reste…

translation.en: Like, the relief when she gave birth
translation.fr: Son accouchement a été un soulagement.

translation.en: and she sent me those pictures of you and Daddy with Peggy,
translation.fr: Elle m'a envoyé des photos de toi et papa avec Peggy.

translation.en: [voice breaks] and I was just so thankful and so happy, and seeing Daddy holding her…
translation.fr: J'étais si reconnaissant et heureux. De voir papa la porter…

translation.en: -I know. -And I was, like…
I was so happy that we got to that moment
translation.fr: J'étais content d'en être arrivé là.

translation.en: and he got through it, and you got through it,
translation.fr: Il s'en est sorti et toi aussi.

translation.en: and you were with your granddaughter and seeing how happy you both were…
translation.fr: Vous étiez avec votre petite-fille. De vous voir si heureux…

translation.en: It was just, like… Just a relief.
I shall never take it for granted,
translation.fr: Je ne le prendrai jamais pour acquis,

translation.en: getting to hang out with you and Daddy,
translation.fr: de pouvoir passer du temps avec vous,

translation.en: even if it is over a cliff.
You know, we've had time to think during the last year
translation.fr: Nous avons eu le temps de réfléchir l'année dernière

translation.en: and we've had a major decision.
-I'm sure your father has told you. -No.
translation.fr: - Je suis sûre que ton père t'en a parlé. - Non.

translation.en: This is so classic of your father.
I gave him one job to do.
translation.fr: Je lui ai donné un boulot à faire.

translation.en: -You're putting Winston up for adoption? -No.
translation.fr: - Vous mettez Winston en adoption ? - Non.

translation.en: -Because I would be fully supportive. -I know you would be.
translation.fr: - Je suis entièrement favorable. - Je le sais.

translation.en: -I'd drive him to the orphanage. -[sighs]
There may be a bit of mileage being put between you and Winston
translation.fr: Il y aura quelques kilomètres entre toi et Winston

translation.en: because your father and I have decided we're going to move out of London.
translation.fr: car ton père et moi avons décidé de quitter Londres.

translation.en: -You're moving out of London? -Yeah.
-Nah. -Yeah.
Because you now are settled with your girlfriend,
translation.fr: Tu es installé avec ta petite amie.

translation.en: Molly and Toby have had Peggy, so we're now grandparents,
translation.fr: Molly et Toby ont eu Peggy. Nous sommes grands-parents.

translation.en: and we just feel that we need to change it up a bit.
translation.fr: On a le sentiment d'avoir besoin de changement.

translation.en: I can't believe Daddy didn't tell you all this.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas à croire que papa ne t'a rien dit.

translation.en: -No. -He hasn't mentioned it at all?
translation.fr: - Non. - Il n'en a pas parlé ?

translation.en: No, he's mainly been making dodgy comments about the Welsh.
translation.fr: Non, il a surtout fait des commentaires déplacés sur les Gallois.

translation.en: [whispering] Fuck!
You've got Daddy over a barrel here, Winston, and you know it.
translation.fr: Papa est dans une situation délicate à cause de toi, Winston, et tu le sais.

translation.en: What I have done, though, Jack, to celebrate this moment,
translation.fr: Pour célébrer ce moment avec toi, Jack,

translation.en: is I've prepared some supper.
-[Sam] Here it comes. You ready? -Yep! Thank you very, very much.
translation.fr: - Le voici. Vous êtes prêts ? - Oui ! Merci beaucoup.

translation.en: Just remember, anything you drop is probably not coming back.
translation.fr: Tout ce qui tombe, ne se récupérera sûrement pas.

translation.en: Yeah, got it.
[Sam] What have you got?
I've got some Chinese from Gordon Ramsay's restaurant, the Lucky Cat.
translation.fr: Les plats chinois du restaurant de Gordon Ramsay, le Lucky Cat.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you joking?
-Yeah, no, I have. -From a week ago?
translation.fr: - Non, c'est là. - D'il y a une semaine ?

translation.en: -Here, look. -I'm not eating that!
translation.fr: - Regarde. - Je ne mangerai pas ça !

translation.en: -Look. -What, all that stuff?
-It's lovely, look. -[coughs]
That's disgusting.
I'm not having some old flabby gyoza that's been in the fridge for a week.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas manger un gyoza flasque, vieux d'une semaine.

translation.en: Just try one.
-Just try it. -It's all cold and flabby.
It looks like one of Daddy's testicles.
translation.fr: On dirait un des testicules de papa.

translation.en: -That is so mean! -What?
-On the food or his testicles? -Daddy's testicles. It's so mean.
translation.fr: - La bouffe ou ses testicules ? - Ses testicules. C'est méchant.

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
-Do you remember that lovely fish you did? -The road-killed fish?
translation.fr: - Tu te souviens du poisson ? - Le poisson écrasé ?

translation.en: -You've brought it with you to Wales? -Yep.
translation.fr: Tu l'as apporté au pays de Galles ?

translation.en: -Look. -It's a week old. Fuck!
translation.fr: - Regarde. - Il a une semaine… Putain !

translation.en: I'm actually gagging.
-You're a monster. -That's a bit fruity, even for me.
translation.fr: - Tu es un monstre. - C'est corsé, même pour moi.

translation.en: [Jack] I think I'm about to chunder onto a puffin.
translation.fr: Je crois que je vais gerber sur un oiseau.

translation.en: It's time for me to take control of this final trip.
translation.fr: Il est temps que je prenne ce dernier voyage en main.

translation.en: We need to do some things we'll regret, whether Daddy likes it or not.
translation.fr: Passons aux choses que nous regretterons, que papa le veuille ou non.

translation.en: Please, no, Max! [yelps]
[man] Let go of…
Jack, can you just fuck off? Because you're just causing havoc.
translation.fr: Jack, tu veux bien dégager ? Tu ne fais que causer des dégâts.

translation.en: Do you want a little cuddle?
-No! Move it away! -Ow, Daddy!
Look, fuck off!
You're a cheat.
-I'm not a cheat. -You are, you're a cheat!
